title: Put Action Behind Your Faith | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Put Action Behind Your Faith | Joel Osteen
description:
It’s one thing to believe in God's promises, but if you want to see those promises fulfilled, you have to take it one step further. Don’t just pray about your situation—start taking steps of faith toward your dreams.  


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
